TopicTitle: Any good tank mods (excluding SC Panzer)?

Articles.Content: Are there any good tank mods out there (excluding SC Panzer Parts)? I already have SC Panzer, but the guns don't shoot (even though I also have BDArmory and a weapon manager on). I've seen some mods that allow people to build WW2 tanks, like a Panther, Tiger, T-34 or King Tiger, and also some mods for more modern tanks, but I don't know what the mods are called.
I haven't installed this so don't know what state it's in - says it's in development:

On 05/09/2017 at 6:43 PM, The_Cat_In_Space said:

Are there any good tank mods out there (excluding SC Panzer Parts)? I already have SC Panzer, but the guns don't shoot (even though I also have BDArmory and a weapon manager on). I've seen some mods that allow people to build WW2 tanks, like a Panther, Tiger, T-34 or King Tiger, and also some mods for more modern tanks, but I don't know what the mods are called.
